TopicTitle: Stopping launch clamp unlimited fuel supply

Articles.Content:
Hello, Does anyone know how to modify the launch clamps so that they don't provide unlimited fuel? Each launch clamp supplies 100 of every resource per second it seems and theres no way to stop it. I need a very exact fuel amount for my mission so I can not have the launch clamps adding fuel back in. How can i stop this?

thanks
Launch clamps only supply energy to keep your craft alive. Pretty sure they do not supply fuel....

Clamps ONLY supply electrical charge, to stop your craft running dry while timewarping on the launch pad. If you're getting fuel, oxidiser, monoprop or any other resource from it, then it could be a mod issue, or a bug.

Uh, folks, launch clamps *do* supply fuel....in MFT or RF. So yes, mod.

Zander: add this to some cfg/make a new cfg:

@PART[launchClamp1]:Final
{
	!MODULE[RefuelingPump] {}
}
